content: आप्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [आप् क्तिन्] {@--1@} Getting, obtaining, gain, acquisition; नित्र°, काम° &c. {@--2@} Reaching, overtaking, meeting with. {@--3@} Binding, connection, relation. {@--4@} Union; especially with a woman (<ls>Med.</ls>). {@--5@} Fitness, aptitude, propriety. {@--6@} Completion, fulfilment; कामस्याप्तिं जगतः प्रतिष्ठां <ls>Kaṭh.</ls> {@--7@} Future time. --<ab>pl.</ab> <ab>N.</ab> of 12 sacrificial verses beginning with Āpaye.
